id: Knowledge Database (used with Save to Notion)
name: Knowledge Database (used with Save to Notion)
description: üìù The best way to capture and organize web content in Notion is to use a free and popular third-party browser extension called Save to Notion. Save to Notion is basically the Notion Web Clipper extension (official extension from Notion) on steroids!When I watch online videos, I often feel inspired by something in that video: be it a product I might consider purchasing or an editing technique I'd like to try out in my next video.
